thread.title: Mrs Marilyn Bromley
thread.title_full: Groves Nurseries reviewed by Mrs Marilyn Bromley

author: Mrs Marilyn Bromley
title: Mrs Marilyn Bromley
text:
We ordered an 'Oxford' planter with trellis (large). It was dispatched on 25th January and arrived just after 10am on the 26th January.
We haven't been able to unpack it yet but it is well packaged.
Looking forward to the unveiling soon!
